# Markify
> Bookmark manager for saving, organizing, and finding links with fast search and smart collections.

## Primary URLs
- https://www.markify.tech/
- https://www.markify.tech/features
- https://www.markify.tech/pricing
- https://www.markify.tech/use-cases
- https://www.markify.tech/blog
- https://www.markify.tech/contact

## Product Notes
- Save links, add notes and tags, and search your bookmark library.
- Create collections and share public collections when needed.
- Access bookmarks across devices via the web app and browser extension.

## Policies
- https://www.markify.tech/privacy
- https://www.markify.tech/terms
- https://www.markify.tech/refund-policy
